title: The Cruellest Journey: 600 Miles by Canoe to the Legendary City of Timbuktu
description: Kira Salak recently became the first person to successfully canoe 600 miles down the River Niger from Old Segou to Timbuktu - the golden city of the Middle Ages, and, legend has it, the doorway to the end of the world - in Mali, West Africa. This is her story."
author: Kira Salak
